#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	int t,i,j,k,l,x,y,f=0,lp,yu,yp;
	cin>>t;
	for(int gh=1;gh<=t;gh++)
	{
		f=0;
		int size1=0,size2=0,li=1;
		int b[100000]={0},a[100000]={0};
		cin>>x>>y;
		yu=y;
		yp=x;
		i=0;
		j=0;
		while(yu>0)
		{
			b[i++]=yu%10;
			yu/=10;
			size2++;
		}
		while(yp>0)
		{
			a[j++]=yp%10;
			yp/=10;
			size1++;
		}
		i=size1-1;
		j=size2-1;
		//cout<<size1<<endl;
		for(lp=j;lp>=0;lp--)
		{
			if(a[i]!=b[lp])
				break;
			i--;
		}
		if(lp==-1)
			f=1;
		while(f==0)
		{
			j=0;
			int carry=0;
			while(1)
			{
				int num=(a[j]*x)+carry;
				a[j]=num%10;
				carry=num/10;
				j++;
				if(carry==0 && j>=size1)
				{
					size1=j;
					break;
				}
			}
			li++;
			i=size1-1;
			j=size2-1;
			for(lp=j;lp>=0;lp--)
			{
				if(b[lp]!=a[i])
					break;
				i--;
			}
			if(lp==-1)
				f=1;
		}
		printf("Case %d: ",gh);
		cout<<li<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
